name: Customize Discount
author: Zworthkey

sections.description:
This Plugin will allow the user to give the discount to users. Through this plugins customer can give their clients an auto
generated coupon code which will applicable only for once and user can also choose when to show code according to amount in cart. On the
basis of country on billing address these code is applied as the user will choose. At Discount logic is very simple.
For example if 20% is discount limit and time given is 3 then for first time it will give 20% on second 10% on third it will be 6%.
sections.installation:
1. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Click on the Setting option of plugin after activation OR Navigate to ** WooCommerce > Settings > ZWK Discount.
  4. Enter the filed respectively.
  5. Save Changes and Enjoy!!
sections.faq:
How much can user customize the discount on which basis

On the basis of billing country.
